What is a pair?: A pair is a set of two values
What is a list?:
A list is a chain of pairs where first value of the pair
 represents an item of a list, and the second value of a pair represents another pair, which also follows the same pattern as the first pair. This forms a chain of pairs which represent a list of values
What is a tree?: A tree is a list that has another list as at least one of its values
What is abstraction?: Abstraction is the act of generalizing functions or objects so that they can be applied more diversely
